name: Caliente
description:
Caliente needs your help!

Caliente is an alien who came to Earth disguised as a cat and is being left behind while their ship crashes into the apartment buildings above. Manage your stamina to help Caliente get back to the ship, but beware! Caliente's alien biology prevents them from resting on metal surfaces.

This infinite runner is a student project from UCSC's 120 series classes. It was made in Spring 2022 and utilizes the Phaser 3 library.
